Error.not_found_description: The page you're looking for doesn't exist or has been moved.
Error.product_not_found_description: The product you're looking for doesn't exist or is no longer available.

home.title: Premium Fashion Store - Best Quality Apparel & Glasses
home.description: Discover the finest collection of premium apparel and designer glasses. Quality guaranteed, easy returns, and 24/7 customer support.
home.keywords: fashion, apparel, glasses, premium quality, online shopping, designer wear

about.title: About Us - Your Trusted Fashion Partner
about.description: Learn about our mission to provide premium quality fashion with exceptional service. Quality assurance and customer satisfaction guaranteed.
about.keywords: about us, fashion company, quality assurance, customer service

contact.title: Contact Us - Get in Touch
contact.description: Contact our friendly customer service team. We're here to help with any questions about our premium fashion collection.
contact.keywords: contact, customer service, support, help, fashion inquiries

cart.title: Shopping Cart - Review Your Items
cart.description: Review and manage your selected fashion items. Secure checkout with multiple payment options available.
cart.keywords: shopping cart, checkout, secure payment, fashion items

checkout.title: Secure Checkout - Complete Your Order
checkout.description: Complete your fashion purchase with our secure checkout process. Fast delivery and hassle-free returns.
checkout.keywords: checkout, secure payment, fast delivery, order completion

products.title: Premium Fashion Collection - Apparel & Glasses
products.description: Browse our extensive collection of premium apparel and designer glasses. Find your perfect style with quality guaranteed.
products.keywords: fashion collection, apparel, glasses, premium products, designer wear

Auth.sign_in_description: Please sign in to your account
Auth.create_account_description: Please fill in your information to register
Auth.min_length_2: Name must be at least 2 characters
Auth.min_length_6: Password must be at least 6 characters
Auth.password_complexity: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, and one number

Contact.page_description: We'd love to hear from you. Send us a message and we'll respond as soon as possible.
Contact.name_min_2: Name must be at least 2 characters
Contact.name_max_50: Name must be less than 50 characters
Contact.phone_min_10: Phone number must be at least 10 digits
Contact.subject_min_5: Subject must be at least 5 characters
Contact.subject_max_100: Subject must be less than 100 characters
Contact.message_min_10: Message must be at least 10 characters
Contact.message_max_1000: Message must be less than 1000 characters

Product.easy_return: Easy return and exchange within 30 days
